name: UI/UX Vault (Free)
description: The Ultimate List of Resources for UI/UX Designers.127+ resources, all within a handy Notion template.Download for FREE now! It's pay-what-you-want, so just enter "0" in the price box to download it for free. Or feel free to donate if you find this useful :)‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure to DUPLICATE the template to your Notion account to get the full experience.

enhancedContent.overview:
The UI/UX Vault is a comprehensive resource library designed specifically for UI and UX designers working in Notion. This free template brings together 127+ carefully curated resources, tools, and references into one centralized hub, eliminating the need to bookmark dozens of websites or maintain scattered reference lists. Whether you're a beginner learning design fundamentals or an experienced designer seeking quick access to trusted resources, this vault serves as your go-to reference center.

By organizing design resources within Notion's flexible workspace, you can easily search, filter, and access exactly what you need when you need it. The template transforms your scattered design bookmarks into a structured knowledge base that grows with your career. Instead of hunting through browser bookmarks or saved articles, everything from typography resources to color palette generators lives in one searchable location.

This template is perfect for designers who want to work more efficiently by having instant access to design inspiration, tools, and educational content. The pay-what-you-want model makes it accessible to students and early-career designers while offering the option to support the creator if you find value in the curation.

features: 127+ curated UI/UX design resources organized by category
Links to design tools, inspiration sites, and learning materials
Regularly updated collection of industry-standard resources
Searchable database structure for quick resource discovery
Categorized sections for different resource types
Customizable tags and filters for personalized organization
One-click access to frequently used design resources
Bookmark replacement that lives in your Notion workspace
Mobile-accessible resource library for on-the-go reference
Design inspiration sources and trend references
Tools for staying current with design best practices

problemsSolved: Eliminates scattered bookmarks across multiple browsers and devices that are hard to find when you need them
Removes the time-consuming process of googling for the same design tools and resources repeatedly
Prevents decision fatigue by providing a pre-vetted collection of quality design resources instead of endless searching
solutionsBenefits: Centralize all your design resources in Notion where you already work, making them searchable and organized alongside your projects
Save 127+ curated resources that have already been vetted for quality, giving you instant access without research time
Build your personal design knowledge base that you can customize and expand over time as your needs evolve
idealFor: UI/UX designers who want a centralized resource hub within their Notion workspace
Design students building their toolkit of go-to resources and learning materials
Freelance designers who need quick access to tools and inspiration across different projects
Product designers looking to consolidate scattered bookmarks into one organized system
notRecommendedFor: Designers who don't use Notion as their primary workspace, as the value comes from integration with your existing workflow
Those seeking project management or design process templates rather than resource links

faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: After downloading, click the 'Duplicate' button to add the template to your Notion workspace. Once duplicated, you'll have immediate access to all 127+ resources organized in a searchable database. You can then customize categories, add your own resources, or remove ones you don't need.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The vault includes 127+ curated links to UI/UX design resources including design tools, inspiration websites, color palette generators, typography resources, icon libraries, learning platforms, and design communities. Each resource is categorized and organized for easy discovery.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! After duplicating to your Notion workspace, you can add your own resources, create new categories, adjust the organization system, and personalize it to match your specific design workflow. The template is fully editable and meant to grow with your needs.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Use it as a quick reference when you need design tools during projects, as a learning resource hub when developing new skills, as a replacement for scattered browser bookmarks, or as a inspiration source when starting new design work. Many designers keep it open in a Notion tab for constant access.
